text: ninkal (avanai) allah enru alaiyunkal; allatu arrahman enralaiyunkal; eppeyaraik kontu avanai ninkal alaittalum, avanukku(p pala) alakiya tirunamankal irukkinrana" enru (napiye!) Kuruviraka innum, um'mutaiya tolukaiyil atika captamittu otatir; mika metuvakavum otatir. Melum ivvirantirkum itaiyil oru mattiyamana valiyaik kataippitippiraka
